article: a memorandum of understanding -lrb- mou -rrb- was signed here sunday between the bangladeshi government and always on network -lrb- aon -rrb- , an american based communications service provider , for providing world class internet service in rural and urban areas at an affordable cost , bangladeshi official news agency bss reported .
abstract: mou signed to provide internet service all over bangladesh
